sentences.sContent: He can come with us, provided he pays for his own meals.
sentences.sCn: 只要他付自己的饭钱，就可以跟我们一起来。

sentences.sContent: ...a large defense buildup finally provided a fiscal stimulus adequate to the economy's needs—and suddenly industry was eager to employ those "unadaptable and untrained" workers...
...and professors who all provided significant support for students who lacked confidence about "belonging" at such a top institution...
...provided that management adopts the new lean and green model...
...The cafeteria provided many kinds of dishes for us today...
...the teacher provided strong "scaffolding"- instructional support-and feedback...
...The team spirit and shared values of the athletes on Bowerman’s teams carried over and provided the basis for the collegial style of management that characterized the early years of Nikes...
